TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MemoryFailPoint extends System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class MemoryFailPoint Inherits CriticalFinalizerObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class MemoryFailPoint sealed : System::Runtime::ConstrainedExecution::CriticalFinalizerObject, IDisposable
type MemoryFailPoint = class inherit CriticalFinalizerObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 在執行作業前檢查記憶體資源是否足夠。

span.span: Checks for sufficient memory resources before executing an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 這個類別被供進階的開發中的使用。This class is intended for use in advanced development. 建立的執行個體類別會建立記憶體閘。Creating an instance of the class creates a memory gate. 記憶體閘檢查資源不足，無法再起始需要大量記憶體的活動。A memory gate checks for sufficient resources before initiating an activity that requires a large amount of memory. 檢查失敗會導致擲回例外狀況。Failing the check results in an exception being thrown. 這個例外狀況可避免啟動作業，並減少可能的失敗，因為缺少資源。This exception prevents an operation from being started and reduces the possibility of failure due to lack of resources. 這可讓您降低效能，以避免例外狀況並不適當的程式碼中的任意位置中的例外狀況的處理都可能會產生任何狀態損毀。This enables you decrease performance to avoid an exception and any state corruption that may result from improper handling of the exception in arbitrary locations in your code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用型別時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 藉由擲回例外狀況，應用程式可以區別作業將無法完成評估] 和 [部分完成的作業可能已損毀應用程式的狀態。By throwing an exception, an application can distinguish between an estimate that an operation will not be able to complete and a partially completed operation that may have corrupted the application state. 這可讓應用程式，以減少封閉式的擴大原則，這可能需要卸載目前的頻率或回收處理序。This allows an application to reduce the frequency of a pessimistic escalation policy, which may require unloading the current or recycling the process. 檢查是否有足夠的記憶體和連續虛擬位址空間可用於所有記憶體回收堆積，並可能增加分頁檔的大小。 checks to see whether sufficient memory and consecutive virtual address space are available in all garbage collection heaps, and may increase the size of the swap file. 可讓長期記憶體可用性的閘道，但呼叫端的存留期間不保證應該一律會使用方法，以確保與相關聯資源會釋出。 makes no guarantees regarding the long-term availability of the memory during the lifetime of the gate, but callers should always use the method to ensure that resources associated with are released. 若要使用記憶體閘，您必須建立物件，並指定百萬位元組 (MB) 的記憶體數目預期在下次執行作業使用。To use a memory gate, you must create a object and specify the number of megabytes (MB) of memory that the next operation is expected to use. 如果記憶體不足，無法使用，擲回例外狀況。If enough memory is not available, an exception is thrown. 建構函式的參數必須是正整數。The parameter of the constructor must be a positive integer. 負值會引發例外狀況。A negative value raises an exception. 運作方式為 16 MB 的資料粒度。 operates at a granularity of 16 MB. 任何小於 16 MB 的值會被當作 16 MB，和其他值都會被視為 16 MB 的下一個最大倍數。Any values smaller than 16 MB are treated as 16 MB, and other values are treated as the next largest multiple of 16 MB. ## Examples 讓應用程式變慢本身，以避免發生耗盡記憶體損毀的方式。 enables an application to slow itself to avoid running out of memory in a corrupting manner. 它應該使用的語彙範圍內。It should be used within a lexical scope. 下列範例會啟動執行緒以處理工作佇列中的項目。The following example launches threads to process items in a work queue. 可用記憶體資源的每個執行緒會啟動之前，會檢查使用。Before each thread is launched, the available memory resources are checked using . 如果擲回例外狀況，main 方法會等候直到記憶體可供使用，再啟動下一個執行緒。If an exception is thrown, the main method waits until memory is available before launching the next thread. [!code-csharp[MemoryFailPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemoryFailPoint/CS/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 sizeInMegabytes) cil managed

param.name: sizeInMegabytes
param.span: 所需的記憶體大小，以 MB 為單位。

span.span: The required memory size, in megabytes.
This must be a positive value.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定順利執行所需的記憶體容量。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the amount of memory required for successful execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以憑您的應用程式處理的工作項目所使用的記憶體數量。The amount of memory used by your application to process a work item can be determined empirically. 若要預估您的應用程式需要處理要求的記憶體數量，請考慮使用方法，以判斷記憶體之前和之後呼叫此方法會處理工作項目。To estimate the amount of memory your application needs to process a request, consider using the method to determine the amount of memory available before and after calling the method that processes the work item. 請參閱程式碼範例以動態方式決定值的類別`sizeInMegabytes`參數。See the class for a code example that dynamically determines the value for the `sizeInMegabytes` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷方法在執行時所需要的記憶體數量。The following example demonstrates how to determine the amount of memory a method requires when executing. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MemoryFailPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemoryFailPoint/CS/program.cs#2)]

exception.span: 指定的記憶體大小為負數。

span.span: The specified memory size is negative.

exception.span: 記憶體不足，無法開始執行閘道所保護的程式碼。

span.span: There is insufficient memory to begin execution of the code protected by the gate.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫端。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成員不能由部分信任或不透明的程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 確認釋出資源，並在記憶體回收行程再利用 物件時執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記憶體回收行程呼叫準備最終處理目前的物件時的方法。The garbage collector calls the method when the current object is ready to be finalized.
